name.description: The upgrade's name as written on the card.

id.description: The upgrade's unique id number. It's not used in the game but it's used to link this upgrade to other data in this dataset.

image.description: The file path for this unit's image.

rws.description: The upgrade's unique RWS id as described in the RWS format.

unique.description:
Some unit cards have unique names, which are identified by the bullet to the left of the name.
 A player cannot field two or more cards that share the same unique name, even if those cards are of different types.

faction.description: The faction this unit belongs to.

columns.description: The number of columns in the formation.

ranks.description: The number of rows in the formation.

slots.description: A list of the slots available to this formation.

items.description: A slot available to this ship.
